data.name: Black Forest Gateau
data.description: A classic German chocolate cake with cherries and whipped cream, perfect for any celebration. The whipped cream adds a light and airy texture making it a irresistible treat for all. A perfect blend of rich chocolate and sweet cherries.

data.name: Chocolate & Strawberry
data.description: Indulge in the rich and decadent combination of chocolate and fresh strawberries with this cake. The perfect blend of sweet and tangy flavors, this cake is a must-try for chocolate and fruit lovers.

data.name: Chocolate Caramel
data.description: A rich and indulgent cake with a smooth chocolate base and a gooey caramel center. Perfect for those with a sweet tooth, this cake will satisfy your cravings with its combination of rich chocolate and sweet caramel.

data.name: Chocolate Deluxe
data.description: An extra indulgent chocolate cake for true chocolate lovers. Made with premium quality cocoa, this cake is a celebration of all things chocolate, from its rich and velvety texture to its decadent flavor.

data.name: Chocolate Dream
data.description: A dream come true for chocolate lovers, this cake is the epitome of indulgence. Made with premium quality cocoa and melted chocolate, it is a treat for the senses and will transport you to a world of chocolate heaven.

data.name: Chocolate Fudge
data.description: Indulge in a rich and creamy chocolate cake that is sure to please your taste buds. This fudgy delight is made with premium cocoa and is perfect for any chocolate lover.

data.name: Chocolate Orange
data.description: Indulge in the zesty and rich flavor of chocolate orange. This cake is made with a moist and fluffy chocolate sponge, infused with the sharp and sweet taste of orange. Perfect for those who love a unique and refreshing dessert.

data.name: Eggless Chocolate Dream
data.description: A chocolate lovers' dream come true, this eggless cake is made with a soft and fluffy chocolate sponge, drizzled with rich chocolate ganache. Perfect for those who want to enjoy a delicious chocolate dessert without eggs.

data.name: Chocolate Duo
data.description: Indulge in the perfect combination of two rich and creamy chocolates in one cake! Our chocolate duo cake is made with dark and milk chocolate, creating a harmonious blend of sweet and bitter notes. Perfect for all chocolate lovers!

data.name: Black Forest
data.description: A classic German chocolate cake with cherries and whipped cream, perfect for a birthday celebration. The whipped cream adds a light and airy texture, making it a irresistible treat for all. A perfect blend of rich chocolate and sweet cherries.

data.name: Blue Ice Cream Themed
data.description: A birthday cake for those with a sweet tooth, the Blue Ice Cream Themed cake is decorated with colorful swirls of buttercream and topped with sweet candy toppings. Perfect for a fun-filled birthday celebration.

data.name: Galaxy Macaron
data.description: Out of this world delicious, the Galaxy Macaron birthday cake is a stunning combination of colorful macarons, swirls of buttercream, and a touch of glitter. Perfect for a birthday celebration that's out of this world.

data.name: Jungle Animal Themed
data.description: A wild and adventurous birthday cake, the Jungle Animal Themed cake is decorated with playful animal toppers, lush green foliage, and a touch of gold. Perfect for a birthday celebration filled with adventure and excitement.

data.name: Over The Rainbow
data.description: Celebrate the magic of birthdays with our Over The Rainbow cake. A beautiful blend of vibrant colors and fun flavors, it's a sweet and playful treat that's perfect for kids and adults alike. With its unique combination of frosting and cake, you'll be whisked away on a journey over the rainbow.

data.name: Red Velvety Drip
data.description: Make your birthday celebration extra special with our Red Velvety Drip cake. The rich, velvety texture of the frosting combined with the moist and fluffy cake makes it a perfect treat for birthdays. The cake is topped with a luscious red drip and a sprinkle of sprinkles, making it a show-stopping dessert.

data.name: Strawberries & Cream
data.description: Celebrate birthdays in style with our Strawberries & Cream cake. The perfect blend of juicy strawberries and creamy frosting, it's a delightful dessert that will tantalize your taste buds. Whether you're looking for a sweet treat for your birthday party or a special someone, this cake is sure to please.

data.name: Superhero Themed
data.description: Bring out your inner superhero with our Superhero Themed cake. Perfect for kids and adults alike, this cake features a fun and playful design that's sure to make your birthday celebration a hit. With its delicious flavors and unique design, this cake is the perfect addition to your birthday party.

data.name: Vanilla Vanilla
data.description: A classic birthday cake with a twist, two layers of creamy vanilla cake with a whipped vanilla frosting. Perfect for those who prefer simple and classic flavors, it's a timeless choice for any celebration.

data.name: All Black Drip
data.description: A sleek and stylish cake, the All Black Drip is the perfect choice for a unique celebration. Decorated with a black ganache drip and sprinkled with edible glitter, this cake is sure to make a statement.

data.name: Butterfly Unicorn
data.description: Bring a touch of magic to your celebration with the Butterfly Unicorn cake. This whimsical creation features a pastel-colored unicorn with butterfly wings, surrounded by delicate flowers and glitter.

data.name: Cookies & Cream
data.description: Indulge in the classic combination of cookies and cream with this fun and festive cake. Decorated with crushed cookies and a creamy frosting, it's a sweet treat that everyone will love.

data.name: Double Rainbow
data.description: Bring a pop of color to your celebration with the Double Rainbow cake. This vibrant creation features a colorful rainbow design, complete with a cloud-like frosting and edible glitter accents.

data.name: Gold Accent Gender Reveal
data.description: Celebrate your special announcement with the Gold Accent Gender Reveal cake. Decorated with a beautiful gold accent and finished with your choice of blue or pink frosting, this cake is sure to make your event even more memorable.

data.name: Lemon Drizzle
data.description: A bright and refreshing treat, the Lemon Drizzle cake is perfect for a summer celebration. Made with fresh lemon juice and a sweet drizzle, it's a light and tangy dessert that everyone will love.

data.name: Banana Bread & Caramel
data.description: The perfect balance of sweet and savory, the Banana Bread & Caramel cake combines classic banana bread flavors with a rich caramel sauce. Perfect for breakfast, brunch or dessert, it's a comforting and satisfying treat.

data.name: Lemon Blueberry
data.description: A sweet and tangy twist on a classic, the Lemon Blueberry cake is a delicious and flavorful dessert. Made with fresh blueberries and a bright lemon flavor, it's a refreshing treat for any occasion.

data.name: Matcha
data.description: A classic Asian flavor, the Matcha cake is a green tea flavored dessert that's perfect for a tea lover. Made with high-quality matcha powder, it's a healthy and delicious treat that's perfect for any occasion.

data.name: Raspberry
data.description: A sweet and fruity flavor, the Raspberry cake is a delicious dessert made with fresh raspberries. Perfect for summer celebrations, it's a light and refreshing treat that everyone will love.

data.name: Red Velvet
data.description: A classic flavor with a twist, the Red Velvet cake is a sweet and moist dessert made with a rich cocoa flavor and a hint of vanilla. Perfect for birthdays and special events, it's a timeless treat that everyone will love.

data.name: Strawberry
data.description: A sweet and fruity flavor, the Strawberry cake is a delicious dessert made with fresh strawberries. Perfect for summer celebrations, it's a light and refreshing treat that everyone will love.

data.name: Victoria Sponge
data.description: A classic British flavor, the Victoria Sponge cake is a light and fluffy dessert made with a delicate sponge and a sweet filling. Perfect for afternoon tea or any special occasion, it's a timeless treat that everyone will love.

data.name: Bloom Naked
data.description: A beautiful and elegant cake, the Bloom Naked cake is a simple yet sophisticated dessert made with delicate layers of cake and a light frosting. Perfect for wedding celebrations, it's a timeless treat that everyone will love.

data.name: Ebony's Kiss
data.description: A rich and indulgent cake, Ebony's Kiss is a decadent dessert made with dark chocolate and a whipped cream frosting. Perfect for wedding celebrations, it's a timeless treat that everyone will love.

data.name: Eternal Rose
data.description: A romantic and beautiful cake, the Eternal Rose cake is a delicate dessert made with a rose flavored sponge and a light frosting. Perfect for wedding celebrations, it's a timeless treat that everyone will love.

data.name: Voshkie Gold
data.description: A luxurious and opulent cake, the Voshkie Gold cake is a rich dessert made with a golden sponge and a whipped cream frosting. Perfect for wedding celebrations, it's a timeless treat that everyone will love.
